original_text: They have made all thy ship boards of fir trees of Senir: they have taken cedars from Lebanon to make masts for thee.
korean_text: 스닐의 잣나무로 네 판자를 만들었음이여 너를 위하여 레바논의 백향목을 가져다 돛대를 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: They have made all thy ship boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 모든 배의 판자를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: they have taken cedars from Lebanon
